wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Irisie nsesa no a, nna tserɛ egye [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Dwumadzi ho nhyehyɛɛ] to mu, na egye to mu fenenkyenemm dɛ yɛnda wo mboae edzi wɔ [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_Creative_Commons_Attribution-ShareAlike_3.0_Unported_License CC BY-SA 3.0 License] na [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL]ase.
Egye to mu dɛ hyperlink anaa URL yɛ edzinbɔ a ɔboa wɔ Creative Commons license ase.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''Woesiw wo IP adrɛɛse kwan wɔ wiki ahorow nyinara do [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all wikis]].'''

$1 ($2) na ɔyɛɛ w'akwansiw no.
Siantsir a ɔmae nye ''$3''.

* Akwansiw no ahyɛse: $4
* Akwansiw no ntwamu: $5

Wo mprɛmprɛ IP adrɛɛse yi nye $6.
Yɛserɛ, fa nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɔwɔ sor ha nyinara ka nhwehwɛmu biara a ebɛyɛ ho.

Sɛ egye dzi dɛ ɔyɛ mfomdo dɛ woesiw wo kwan a, ibotum ahwehwɛ nsɛm fofor na akwankyerɛ wɔ [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] wiadze nhyehyɛɛ.
Anaa ibebisa akwansiw no ho nsɛm, yɛserɛ [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:

Anaa ibebisa akwansiw no ho nsɛm, yɛserɛ [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]].iiíí
